title: Days of Stargazey Pie

description: Episode of Series "Australian mosaic". Cornish descendants, a tourist guide and a historian talk about the contribution that the Cornish miners made to the development of the South Australian copper mines at Burra and Moonta. We also look at some of their traditions which have been handed down from generation to generation in this 'Little Cornwall"
